headline: NBCUniversal, Amazon strike deal to bring Peacock to Prime Video Channels
summary: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) -Comcast-owned NBCUniversal,  and Amazon have reached a deal to bring the ad-free version of Peacock to Prime Video Channels, the first time the streaming service has been offered as part of the online retailer's package of digital channels.  The Prime Video Channels deal is one element of a broader distribution agreement that will give consumers continued access to the Peacock app on Amazon's Fire TV streaming video platform, the renewed ability to buy or rent Universal Pictures movies through Prime Video, or watch Prime Video on Comcast's Xfinity X1 devices.

raw.headline: NBCUniversal, Amazon strike deal to bring Peacock to Prime Video Channels
raw.summary: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) -Comcast-owned NBCUniversal,  and Amazon have reached a deal to bring the ad-free version of Peacock to Prime Video Channels, the first time the streaming service has been offered as part of the online retailer's package of digital channels.  The Prime Video Channels deal is one element of a broader distribution agreement that will give consumers continued access to the Peacock app on Amazon's Fire TV streaming video platform, the renewed ability to buy or rent Universal Pictures movies through Prime Video, or watch Prime Video on Comcast's Xfinity X1 devices.

headline: LPL Financial Expands Use of Amazon Business for Key Business Purchasing Needs
summary: SEATTLE, August 28, 2025--Amazon (NASDAQ: AMZN) today announced that LPL Financial has expanded its use of Amazon Business, the company’s online business-to-business store, to its financial advisors nationwide for their key business purchasing needs. LPL Financial is a leading wealth management firm in the U.S., supporting over 29,000 financial advisors and the wealth management practices of approximately 1,200 financial institutions.

headline: Dr. Jeffrey L. Reynolds' New Book Rockets Up Amazon's Charts to Debut as a Top New Release
summary: When Dr. Jeffrey L. Reynolds crossed the IRONMAN Florida finish line in November 2021, he thought he had conquered the ultimate test of physical and mental endurance. But his celebration was short-lived. A routine PSA test revealed prostate cancer, followed by an even more shocking diagnosis during a colonoscopy: Stage 3B colorectal cancer - a potentially deadly disease that required immediate, aggressive treatment.

headline: Volkswagen extends Amazon cloud partnership to save costs with AI
summary: BERLIN (Reuters) -Volkswagen has extended its 'factory cloud' partnership with Amazon Web Services by another five years, the German carmaker said on Thursday, as it rolls out the use of artificial intelligence to improve production and reduce costs.  The company partnered with the cloud computing services unit of Amazon.com to create a digital production platform, or DPP, which Volkswagen says is already used in 43 locations in Europe, North America and South America.  Globally, Volkswagen has over 114 production sites.

raw.headline: Volkswagen extends Amazon cloud partnership to save costs with AI
raw.summary: BERLIN (Reuters) -Volkswagen has extended its 'factory cloud' partnership with Amazon Web Services by another five years, the German carmaker said on Thursday, as it rolls out the use of artificial intelligence to improve production and reduce costs.  The company partnered with the cloud computing services unit of Amazon.com to create a digital production platform, or DPP, which Volkswagen says is already used in 43 locations in Europe, North America and South America.  Globally, Volkswagen has over 114 production sites.

headline: Assessing Amazon After $570M Vietnam Kuiper Satellite Investment and Recent Stock Rally
summary: Trying to decide what to do with Amazon.com stock can feel like standing at a busy intersection. You see steady streams of headlines, bold moves into new markets, and a price chart that rarely sits still. Lately, the action has been upward; Amazon shares popped 3.2% over the last week, even if their 30-day move remains just below water at -0.8%. Zoom out and the story is clearer: 33.1% gains over the past year and a striking 79.3% return across the last three years paint Amazon as anything...

headline: Even Nvidia Has Speed Limits
summary: Nvidia’s growth potential remains an important area of interest for investors—and the market at large.  After a moment of panic earlier this year as President Trump kicked off his trade war, Nvidia has come roaring back.  By Wednesday’s close, the stock was up 65% since Trump’s “Liberation Day” event on April 2, compared with average gains of 27% for  Microsoft Amazon.com Meta Platforms  and Google’s parent,  Alphabet  Those happen to be the companies spending the most in snapping up Nvidia’s chips to build their own AI services.
